/usr/bin/c++   -lOpenCL -fopenmp -std=c++0x -Wall -Wclobbered -Wempty-body -Wignored-qualifiers -Wmissing-field-initializers -Wsign-compare -Wtype-limits -Wuninitialized -Wunused-parameter -Wunused-but-set-parameter -Wno-comment -Wno-type-limits -Wno-strict-aliasing -lOpenCL    CMakeFiles/scan.dir/scan.cpp.o  -o scan -rdynamic -lboost_date_time -lboost_filesystem -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lboost_unit_test_framework -lboost_program_options -lpthread
